posts.post_content: It's more expensive than [Howling Mine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Howling Mine), and isn't tappable to prevent your opponent from drawing, but in return, you don't lose card advantage the turn after you summon it? Not bad. It'll still help decks that need to draw lots, just like any other draw engine.
posts.html:
It's more expensive than Howling Mine, and isn't tappable to prevent your opponent from drawing, but in return, you don't lose card advantage the turn after you summon it? Not bad. It'll still help decks that need to draw lots, just like any other draw engine.

I find that this card really plays nice with [Liliana Vess](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Liliana Vess). Your opponent doesn't have any cards to discard? Tap, now he/she does! Need that card you are tutoring for right now? Tap, take it!  
Helped me come in second place at the prerelease draft, those two did.
